+#![feature(nll)]
+
+struct WithDrop;
+
+impl Drop for WithDrop {
+    fn drop(&mut self) {}
+}
+
+fn consume(x: (&mut (), WithDrop)) -> &mut () { x.0 }
+
+fn main() {}
